entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow at times heavy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
